segments.text: Hello . This is Hamilton ’ s Heating and cooling service . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My home freezer is not working properly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It keeps running all the time , never stopping . And it makes a strange sound . All the ice cream inside it melted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe the compressor is going bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you send the technician to check it out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . But there is a minimum charge of $ 60 for a service visit . If your freezer needs parts , there will be an additional charge .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I ’ ll pay the charges .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . let me check our technician ’ s schedules . I ’ ll call you back and let you know what time we can send a service technician to your house . What is your phone number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I ’ ll call you right back .
segments.speaker: S1
